bibl.title: The Magical Formula on a Lost Uterine Amulet. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Magical gem found in 1883 in Torontál, lost by now. Lion-headed ans snake-bodied god, whose name was Chum or Chnubis; Greek inscription on the other side. Uses parallels from Greek magical papyri.
bibl.seg: GRADVOHL Edina, The Magical Formula on a Lost Uterine Amulet. Avec résumé en anglais.
Magical gem found in 1883 in Torontál, lost by now. Lion-headed ans snake-bodied god, whose name was Chum or Chnubis; Greek inscription on the other side. Uses parallels from Greek magical papyri.
